title: AEDAGA 168+2 Colours Alcohol Markers with Free App for Colouring, Alcohol Pens for Anime,Manga,Drawing,Sketching and Calligraphy, Art Supplies for Adults and Kids
features: PERFECT COLOUR MATCHING WITH FREE APP: Our alcohol marker comes with a free App that allows you to quickly find the right marker and achieve the perfect color for your drawing. Our alcohol marker solves the problem of colour difference and inability to quickly identify markers in other products, making it very suitable for beginners and advanced users.

FAST DRYING & HIGH QUALITY: Our alcohol-based markers use alcohol as the solvent, which dries quickly, making them ideal for artists. The broad tip of the marker is 1-7mm and the fine tip is 1mm, giving you versatility in creating your artwork.

SMART APP ENHANCES THE JOY OF DRAWING: Our alcohol markers paired with the App help you solve the problems of difficult color selection caused by too many similar colours, inaccurate colours, and pen cap colour differences. The chisel tip & fine tip on our alcohol markers is perfect for artists who want to create precise lines and details.

VERSATILE AND PRACTICAL: Our alcohol markers are perfect for colouring sketching and drawing, it also suitable for a wide range of other artistic applications. They are alcohol-based and offer superior colour saturation and blending, making them perfect for artists of all levels.

CONVENIENT STORAGE BAG PACKAGING: This set includes 168 alcohol-based markers(extra F and F1 alcohol markers), a marker case and a coloring card. The storage bag packaging makes it easy to take your markers with you wherever you go.
description: Product Description Previous page Identify colours with App By using our App, you can easily and accurately identify colors, making your drawing smoother and efficient. Photo Picker by App You can select your favorite photos and create beautiful pictures by using our alcohol alcohol markers with the App. Camera Picker by App You can use your phone camera to create beautiful pictures by using our alcohol markers with the App. Hue Picker by App You can use the hue function to match professional colours E-Colour Card The app comes with an electronic colour card, allowing you to view colours anytime, anywhere Next page Using alcohol based ink, it is easy to draw natural transition colors without worrying about uneven or unnatural colours High quality alcohol marker pen, with strong sealing of the pen cover, effectively prevents alcohol evaporation from causing inability to write Colourful and vibrant, with a variety of colors to choose from, helping you depict the perfect artwork Adopting a standard colour system, each alcohol marker comes with a color code, which can be well matched with the App for use Alcohol Markers with App 80 Colours Art Markers Add To Basket 120 Colours Art Markers Add To Basket 168 Colours Art Markers Add To Basket 204 Colours Art Markers Add To Basket 262 Colours Art Markers Add To Basket Customer Reviews 4.4 out of 5 stars 157 4.4 out of 5 stars 157 4.4 out of 5 stars 157 4.4 out of 5 stars 157 4.4 out of 5 stars 157 Price £23.99 £ 23 . 99 £35.99 £ 35 . 99 £49.99 £ 49 . 99 £59.99 £ 59 . 99 £77.99 £ 77 . 99 Colours 80 Colours 120 Colours 168 Colours 204 Colours 262 Colours App ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Size 15 x 13.5 x 16 cm 22 x 17 x 16 cm 30 x 21 x 16 cm 30 x 21 x 16 cm 34 x 24 x 16 cm Weight 1.46 kg 2.2 kg 3.3 kg 3.72 kg 4.7 kg Tips Chisel & Fine(1-7mm) Chisel & Fine(1-7mm) Chisel & Fine(1-7mm) Chisel & Fine(1-7mm) Chisel & Fine(1-7mm) What is included in Alcohol Marker Set? Our alcohol marker set includes dual tips alcohol markers, a storage bag, graffiti color cards, as well as a free dedicated painting App. What is Magic Color 168? Magic Color 168 is an App developed by us that deeply combines alcohol markers and auxiliary painting software. By using both in combination, it greatly improves our users’ painting experience. What functions does Magic Color 168 have？How to download the App? The main functions include color recognition, best matching alcohol markers recommendation, electronic color cards and etc. You can download " Magic Color 168 " from the App Store or Google Play. What is the difference between alcohol-based markers and water-based markers? Alcohol markers have the characteristics of rapid drying, bright colors, strong coverage, and less prone to smudging after drying. Moreover, it has a wider range of applications, including graffiti, drawing and writing. How to prevent alcohol-based markers from bleeding on paper? To prevent alcohol-based markers from bleeding through paper, it is recommended to use thicker paper or place a bleed-resistant barrier underneath the drawing paper.
